So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, identify study types, and design the study.
**In this chapter**, you will learn how to collect the data needed to answer the RQ.
You will learn to:

* record the important steps in data collection.
* describe study protocols.
* ask survey questions.
* describe the basic differences between online and paper surveys.
